Package src.controller

Class PaymentManager

java.lang.Object
src.controller.PaymentManager
public class PaymentManager extends Object
PaymentManager is a controller class that generates Invoice and handles payment.

Whenever a Room has checked out, it will receive information from GuestManager, RoomManager, ReservationManager, and RoomServiceManager to generate Invoice and print it upon payment.

Since:
2022-04-04

  • Method Details

    • calculateSubTotal

      public static double calculateSubTotal(String roomId, String reservationId)
      A method that calculates the subtotal of a reservation.

      Calls RoomManager to get room price, calls ReservationManager to retrieve number of stays and calls RoomServiceManager to get order price of the room.

      Parameters:
      roomId - id of the room
      reservationId - id of the reservation
      Returns:
      subtotal of the reservation corresponding to the room id.

    • calculateTotal

      public static double calculateTotal(double subTotal, double discountRate, double taxRate)
      A method that sums the subtotal and the discount rate and tax rate
      Parameters:
      subTotal - subtotal of the reservation
      discountRate - discount rate of the hotel
      taxRate - tax rate of the hotel
      Returns:
      total of the reservation

    • printInvoice

      public static void printInvoice(Invoice invoice)
      A method that print out the invoice

      See Invoice For the details of the reservation and order

      Parameters:
      invoice - invoice of the reservation

    • handlePayment

      public static void handlePayment(String reservationId)
      A method that generates invoice of a particular reservation during checkout

      See Reservation For the details of the reservation

      Parameters:
      reservationId - id of the reservation
